alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cheyenne County through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Gurley, or 13 miles northeast of Sidney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Cheyenne County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
